        a method to obtain screenshots
        Parameters:
        imageName - - the name of the image typically generated via functions from TestOutput.generateImageName

      • openTab

        public int openTab()
        a way to open a new tab, and have it selected. Note, no content will be present on this new tab, use the goToURL method to open load some content
        Returns:
        Integer: the number of errors encountered while executing these steps

      • openTab

        public int openTab(String url)
        a way to open a new tab, and have it selected. The page provided will be loaded
        Parameters:
        url - - the url to load once the new tab is opened and selected
        Returns:
        Integer: the number of errors encountered while executing these steps

      • switchNextTab

        public int switchNextTab()
        a function to switch tabs. this method will switch to the next available tab. if the last tab is already selected, it will loop back to the first tab
        Returns:
        Integer: the number of errors encountered while executing these steps

      • switchPreviousTab

        public int switchPreviousTab()
        a function to switch tabs. this method will switch to the previous available tab. if the first tab is already selected, it will loop back to the last tab
        Returns:
        Integer: the number of errors encountered while executing these steps

      • closeTab

        public int closeTab()
        a function to close tabs. note that if this is the only tab open, you will end the session
        Returns:
        Integer: the number of errors encountered while executing these steps

      • goBack

        public int goBack()
        some functionality to go back one page in browser history
        Returns:
        Integer: the number of errors encountered while executing these steps

      • goForward

        public int goForward()
        some functionality to go forward one page in browser history
        Returns:
        Integer: the number of errors encountered while executing these steps

      • refresh

        public int refresh()
        some functionality to reload the current page
        Returns:
        Integer: the number of errors encountered while executing these steps

      • refreshHard

        public int refreshHard()
        some functionality to reload the current page while clearing the cache. This only works for certain browsers, as the command/control and F5 key combination is used to perform the action
        Returns:
        Integer: the number of errors encountered while executing these steps

      • setCookie

        public int setCookie(org.openqa.selenium.Cookie cookie)
        some functionality to add a specific cookie to the page
        Parameters:
        cookie - - the details of the cookie to set
        Returns:
        Integer: the number of errors encountered while executing these steps

        public int switchToParentWindow()
        a function to switch back to the parent window.
        Returns:
        Integer: the number of errors encountered while executing these steps

      • closeCurrentWindow

        public int closeCurrentWindow()
        a function to close the currently selected window. After this window is closed, ensure that focus is shifted to the next window using switchToXxxWindow methods
        Returns:
        Integer: the number of errors encountered while executing these steps
